gladosPackage

Class NeuralNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • gladosPackage.NeuralNetwork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NeuralNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A feed forward neural network which consists of an input layer, an output layer and at least one hidden layer.
    Author:
    Laty
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NeuralNetwork(int[] structure, double learningRate)
      Creates a feed forward neural network following the structure of structure (for example {1,3,2} would give a network with 1 neuron in the inputLayer, 3 in one intermediateLayer and 2 in the outputLayer) Also takes the learning rate of the structure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateNeuronDiffs(double[] expectedOutputs)
      Recalculates all the neuron gradients/errors following to the backpropagation algorithm.
      void fire()
      Applies the propagation algorithm (since this is a feed forward neural network, this simply calls the fire method of every Neuron layer by layer, starting from the inputLayer and ending with the outputLayer.
      java.util.List<AbstractNeuron> getInputLayer() 
      java.util.List<AbstractNeuron> getIntermediateLayer(int i) 
      java.util.List<AbstractNeuron> getOutputLayer() 
      java.util.List<java.lang.Double> getOutputs()
      Returns the current outputs of the outputLayer, warning this does not apply a propagation algorithm, as such it does NOT modifiy the neural net in any way.
      void incrementWeightDiffs()
      Increments all the weight gradients for all the neurons in the net
      void incrementWeights()
      Increments all the weights for all the neurons in the net.
      void resetLR()
      Resets the learning rate to default for all the neurons in the network when using adaptable Learning Rate.
      void resetWeightDiffs()
      Resets all the weight gradients for all the neurons in the net.
      void resetWeightDiffsMomentum(double alphaRate)
      Resets all the weight gradients for all the neurons in the net, according to the momentum method and with the alphaRate as parameter.
      void setInputs(double[] inputs)
      Sets the raw inputs to the neural network
      void setLearningRate(double newLearningRate)
      Sets a learning rate for the backpropagation algorithm.
      void setOneInput(double input, int i)
      Modifies one of the inputs, at the i index.
      void varyLR(double decreaseLR, double increaseLR)
      Changes the learning rate for every neuron in the network when using adaptable Learning Rates.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • fire

        public void fire()
        Applies the propagation algorithm (since this is a feed forward neural network, this simply calls the fire method of every Neuron layer by layer, starting from the inputLayer and ending with the outputLayer.

      • getOutputs

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Double> getOutputs()
        Returns the current outputs of the outputLayer, warning this does not apply a propagation algorithm, as such it does NOT modifiy the neural net in any way.

      • varyLR

        public void varyLR(double decreaseLR,
                   double increaseLR)
        Changes the learning rate for every neuron in the network when using adaptable Learning Rates.

      • resetLR

        public void resetLR()
        Resets the learning rate to default for all the neurons in the network when using adaptable Learning Rate.
